Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.title: Call Me Mrs. Sprayfoam
Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.description: The official anthem for Karen, the legendary Mrs. Sprayfoam herself! Augusta and CSRA's most trusted insulation queen serving Georgia and South Carolina.
Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.service_area: Augusta GA, Aiken SC, Grovetown, and the CSRA
Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.ad_copy: Need spray foam insulation in Augusta or Aiken? Call Karen - that's Mrs. Sprayfoam to you! 706-386-8821 or 678-995-FOAM. She's the CSRA's leading spray foam installer and Spray Foam World Wide Ambassador!
fun_facts: Karen won the Spray Foam World Wide Grand Prize at the industry's largest event in 2022!
Mrs. Sprayfoam is the CSRA's leading Spray Foam Installer AND a Spray Foam World Wide Ambassador
They do spray foam, fiberglass, mineral wool, blown-in, coatings AND removals - the full package!
This track was made for SprayFoamRadio.com to honor the queen of insulation
Call 706-386-8821 or 678-995-FOAM - yes, that's 995-FOAM!
dj_intro_hints: Shoutout to Karen in Augusta Georgia!
Serving Augusta, Aiken, and the whole CSRA!
She won the Spray Foam World Wide Grand Prize - that's the real deal!

Hey, I just meant you, and this is crazy, but here's my number, so call me maybe, It looks like you need insulation, maybe, so here's my number, call the phone, lady. Hey, I just meant you, and this is crazy, but here's my number, so call me maybe, It looks like you need insulation, maybe, so here's my number, call the phone, lady. Hey, I just meant you, and this is crazy, but here's my number, so call me maybe, It looks like you need insulation, maybe, so here's my number, call the phone, lady.

Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.title: Espuma y Calidez 2
Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.description: Spanish-language track about foam and warmth - the sequel that slaps even harder!
Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.ad_copy: Espuma para tu hogar - comfort in every spray!
fun_facts: Espuma means foam in Spanish
Calidez means warmth - perfect for insulation vibes
Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.transcribed_lyrics: Es puma de poliuretano en las paredes, están En energía conservada y con el frío ya no están Esa casa tan calidad y el aire no se va Un refugio tan cómodo que mai quien puede igualar Muros tan fuertes, el calor no puede entrar El invierno es suave, no tiene que esperar Con el puma nos protegemos en su abrazo calentón Esa fórmula mágica que nos da su rendición Guardamos la energía, el calor es como un don Un ambiente tan cómodo como el sol en el balcón Muros llenos de vida, el frío se va de aquí Es puma que nos cuida en cada oportunidad Da el licuaro galco, el espuma va a brillar Cada licuaro ha brigado y no hay frío para entrar Si en los cálidos sin límites están Por esta magia el invierno se va En esas cuatro paredes, el confort en control lugar Un refugio tan cálido no se puede comparar
Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.key_lyrics: Es puma que nos cuida en cada oportunidad

Foam-Everything.mp3.title: Foam Everything
Foam-Everything.mp3.description: An anthem for spray foam enthusiasts - if it can be foamed, FOAM IT!
Foam-Everything.mp3.ad_copy: Walls, ceilings, crawl spaces - foam everything for maximum efficiency!
fun_facts: Spray foam can expand up to 100x its original volume
This track gets contractors hyped
Foam-Everything.mp3.transcribed_lyrics: See it, cover it, don't think twice. Innovation, industry, with precision and perfection. It's like living in a dream. Phone, everything, phone, everything. Stop the cold and the moisture, make your energy clean. Phone, everything, phone, everything. Save on bills and live better here. Save it, switching. Phone, phone, everything. Phone, phone, everything. Leaky walls. Oh, we gotta do. Drafty doors. You know the trick. Phone, phone, everything. Rising bills. How we kill it? Phone, phone, everything. Feel the chill. Just want to fix. Phone, phone, everything. Phone, phone, everything. Phone, everything, phone, everything. All those cracks and those crevices. Let it cling now. Drafts up high. Where did I add it? Phone, it. Barric base. What's the game? Basement. Phone, it. Heats escaping. We're through here. Walls. Just. Phone, it. Stampin' dark. Creek is fake. Crawl stays. Home it. Old house feel. Husty air. Cellar. Fomed. Roof hang low. Healing the breathe. Overhang. Fomed.

Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.title: Foam It - We Insulate You Right
Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.description: The official anthem for Moe and the FoamIt crew in Mississauga! Toronto's trusted insulation experts serving the entire GTA since 2008.
Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.service_area: Greater Toronto Area - Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, Oakville, Markham, Richmond Hill, Ajax, Pickering, Oshawa, Burlington, and all of the GTA
Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.ad_copy: Yo Toronto! Need insulation done right? Call Moe at FoamIt - 416-893-8712! Family-owned, 15+ years experience, serving the whole GTA. They'll cut your energy bills by up to 50%! That's foamit.ca baby!
fun_facts: FoamIt is a family-owned business with 15+ years experience since 2008!
Moe and the crew serve the ENTIRE Greater Toronto Area
They're members of BILD, CHBA, OHBA, RenoMark, and CARAHS - fully certified!
They do spray foam, blown-in, attic, basement, garage, AND removal & replacement
416-893-8712 - that's the number for Toronto's trusted insulation experts!
They can reduce your energy bills by up to 50% - that's real savings!
dj_intro_hints: 416-893-8712 - call FoamIt for the whole GTA!
From Toronto to Brampton to Oakville - Moe's got you covered!

Hey-Diddle-Diddle.mp3.title: Hey Diddle Diddle
Hey-Diddle-Diddle.mp3.description: A playful nursery rhyme remix with a sprayfoam twist!
Hey-Diddle-Diddle.mp3.ad_copy: Hey diddle diddle, foam in the middle - insulate your home from floor to ceiling!
fun_facts: Even nursery rhymes need good insulation
The cow jumped over the moon because its barn was too hot - shoulda used spray foam

Spanish-ComfyLife.mp3.title: Comfy Life (Spanish Version)
Spanish-ComfyLife.mp3.description: La vida comoda - living that comfortable, well-insulated life en español!
Spanish-ComfyLife.mp3.ad_copy: Viva la vida comoda - spray foam for the comfortable life!
fun_facts: Spray foam insulation is popular worldwide
This track brings the Latin flavor to the foam game
Spanish-ComfyLife.mp3.transcribed_lyrics: Es sencillo, no hay más que pedir, cerramos todo, lo veamos sonreír. Enca esquina, los sentimos, leaving the conflite, o me todos vivimos. El calor no abraza, el frío queda la fuera, y la quitaita si no te damos donde quieren. Nos gusta así. Se llado todo. Si dirá, pues es siente, todo en orden o mantenemos. Ha ajustado bien seguro, nada entra ni muy muy yo. El calor se queda, el frío no entra más. Si dirá, pues no damos, así nos gusta más.

Mrs. SprayFoam Let It Foam.mp3.title: Let It Foam

Mrs. SprayFoam Let It Foam.mp3.ad_copy: Let it foam, let it foam! Call Mrs. Sprayfoam at 706-386-8821 for Augusta's finest insulation!

Karen's second song after Call Me Mrs. Sprayfoam
The cold never bothered her anyway - because her house is properly insulated!

fun_facts: G-funk meets spray foam in this industry first
Lay back and let the foam expand - like Snoop intended
This track goes hard at job sites across the nation

Spray-Foam_tip_blues.mp3.title: Spray Foam Tip Blues
Spray-Foam_tip_blues.mp3.description: When your gun tip clogs and your day goes wrong - we've all been there. A blues tribute to the struggles of spray foam life.
Spray-Foam_tip_blues.mp3.ad_copy: Woke up this morning, my tip was clogged... the spray foam tip blues got me down!
fun_facts: Every foam contractor knows the pain of a clogged tip
Blues music meets blue-collar foam work
Play this when you're cleaning your equipment at the end of a long day
Spray-Foam_tip_blues.mp3.transcribed_lyrics: I'm the tub and the spray foam dropped over it, my tip didn't come in, it just ain't fun to hold but it, hey young foam, I don't you frown, you just drill it out and clean it down with that long stringy thing, it keeps on coming, You've got spray in every least mode right down that hole, but time's just tough and the spray foam dropped over it, Oh, I'm pulling out my hair, I call the supplier, but they don't care, my tip didn't come in, it just ain't fun to hold but it, my pattern's sprayin' everywhere, I just keep going like I just don't care, times are tough and the spray foam dropped over it, I guess I'll go, I check my town, I've had my help, I fell asleep again Times of puff and a spray phone, rough old buddy Oh, I'm really getting sick of this shit It started thinking I just might quit Times of tough and spray phone, rough old buddy In the middle of a raging pit, I take apart the gun to look at it Who rebuilt this gun that chambers no good? My bet goes right through the impingement holes I guess that's why my tip is gummed Hold funny
Spray-Foam_tip_blues.mp3.key_lyrics: My tip didn't come in, it just ain't fun to hold but it

Sunshine-Shirts-The-Screen-Printing-Anth.description: This song celebrates the hustle and energy of a screen printing shop, where Mike and Nick work hard to create vibrant shirts day and night. It's a catchy tune about the rhythm of the process and the joy of creation.

Screen-Printing-Highland-Beat.mp3.description: This song describes the daily grind of a screen printing shop run by Mike and Nick, filled with hard work and a campy, upbeat energy. They're printing sunshine shirts day and night to the rhythm of their 'squeegee dance'.

Spray-Foam-Warmth.mp3.title: Spray Foam Warmth
Spray-Foam-Warmth.mp3.description: This song is a quirky ode to the insulating power of spray foam. It humorously highlights how spray foam keeps you warm and cozy during cold weather.
Spray-Foam-Warmth.mp3.key_lyrics: Spray foam keeps you warm, keeps you cozy in the storm
Spray-Foam-Warmth.mp3.transcribed_lyrics: It's chilly outside, frostbites my nose, but inside these walls, the warmth just grows, spray foams, the hero, it's got the flow, spray foam keeps you warm, keeps you cozy in the storm, spray foam keeps you warm, like a hug and perfect foam, spray foam keeps you warm, keeps you cozy in the storm, spray foam keeps you warm, cold winds hailing, knocking on the door, but this foam's tough, it evens the score, seals up the cracks, can't ask for more, wish, wish, the spray goes on, 808 beats to warming sun, spray foam keeps you warm, keeps you cozy in the storm, spray foam keeps you warm, like a hug and perfect foam, spray foam keeps you warm, keeps you cozy in the storm, spray foam keeps you warm, no more, we're snug and tight, spray foam's magic day and night, seal the deal, feel the spray foam, spray foam keeps you warm, spray foam keeps you warm,

SprayFoamRadio-Intro-1.mp3.description: A distorted, experimental track evoking a sense of fragmented transmissions and distorted realities through radio waves. It suggests a hidden broadcast offering warmth amidst chaos.

The Spray Foam Marksman.mp3.title: The Spray Foam Marksman
The Spray Foam Marksman.mp3.artist: DJ FoamBot Productions feat. On the Mark Spray Foam
The Spray Foam Marksman.mp3.description: The official anthem for Mark and the On the Mark Spray Foam crew in Holiday, Florida! Over 20 years of precision spray foam insulation serving Tampa Bay and surrounding counties. On the mark every time!
The Spray Foam Marksman.mp3.service_area: Holiday FL, Tampa Bay - Hernando, Pasco, Manatee, Hillsborough, and Pinellas Counties
The Spray Foam Marksman.mp3.business_name: On the Mark Spray Foam Insulation LLC
The Spray Foam Marksman.mp3.ad_copy: Tampa Bay! Need spray foam done RIGHT? Call Mark at On the Mark Spray Foam - 352-942-4593! Over 20 years experience, serving Holiday, Tampa, and all of Pasco, Hernando, Hillsborough, Manatee, and Pinellas counties. On the mark EVERY time! onthemarksprayfoam.net
fun_facts: On the Mark Spray Foam has over 20 years of experience in the Tampa Bay area!
Mark and the crew serve 5 Florida counties - Hernando, Pasco, Manatee, Hillsborough, and Pinellas!
352-942-4593 - that's the number for Tampa Bay's precision foam experts!
Licensed contractor in Pasco County - the real deal!
Based in Holiday, FL - serving all of Tampa Bay!
SPFA (Spray Polyurethane Foam Alliance) member - industry certified!
dj_intro_hints: Shoutout to Mark in Holiday Florida!
On the Mark Spray Foam - 20+ years of precision!
Serving Tampa Bay and 5 Florida counties!
On the mark EVERY time - that's their guarantee!

Hammer-and-Hustle-Heart-of-Gold.mp3.title: Hammer and Hustle (Heart of Gold)
Hammer-and-Hustle-Heart-of-Gold.mp3.description: This song celebrates the hard work and dedication of construction workers, highlighting their grit, pride, and commitment to building dreams, despite the physical challenges they face. It emphasizes their strong work ethic and the rewarding nature of their labor.

Hammer-and-Hustle-Heart-of-Gold.mp3.transcribed_lyrics: . . Calis-Hands gripping the chip coffee cups, Sunrise creeping time to lace the boots up, Still toast off an ongrabble and grit, Blue prints in my head ain't no room to quit. The hammer sings sweet nails, dance on the wood, Building dreams for folks making rough things look good. Hammer and hustle, blood and muscle, Every swings of prayer, every board's a puzzle. We don't back down, we don't fold, Contracting dreams with a heart of gold. Sweat dripping, shirt clings to my spine, So to snowing, that's my daily grind. Concrete whisper stories of the past, Foundations we poured, built to last. Lunchtime laughs, over till gate fees, Families at home, but here's my second piece. Broken bags, but unbroken pride, We build the future, one plank at a time. One plank at a time. Hammer and hustle, blood and muscle, Every swings of prayer, every board's a puzzle. We don't back down, we don't fold. Contracting dreams with a heart of gold. Rain so jacky, storms can deter, We're the backbone on sand, Unsong workers through, Blister palms and aching bombs, We carve out spaces, folks come home. Hammer and hustle, blood and muscle, Every swings of prayer, every board's a puzzle. We don't back down, we don't fold. Contracting dreams with a heart of gold. With a heart of gold. With a heart of gold. With a heart of gold. With a heart of gold.

Renussers-Prayer-Ode-to-Construction.mp3.description: This song is a tribute to the hard work and dedication of construction workers, highlighting their physical labor, resilience, and the pride they take in building a future. Iso-Stains-ALLSTATE.mp3.ad_copy: California! Need spray foam done right? Call Rusty at ALLSTATE - 559-739-9519! Family-owned, 20+ years experience, serving the ENTIRE state from the Bay to San Diego. Save up to 50% on your utility bills! That's allstatesprayfoam.com!
fun_facts: ALLSTATE is a family-owned business with over 20 years of experience!
Rusty and the crew serve ALL of California - from Eureka to San Diego!
They're BBB A-rated and certified with SPFA and ICAA!
559-739-9519 - that's the number for California's spray foam experts!
They can save you up to 50% on utility bills - that's real money!
Licensed contractor C-2-1052735 - the real deal!
dj_intro_hints: Shoutout to Rusty in Visalia California!
From the Bay to LA, ALLSTATE's got you covered!
